collectionMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population
collectionMetadata.description: Convicted Penal Population as at 31 December of each year.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Gender and Offence Group
datasetMetadata.description: Population of convicted penal inmates as at 31 December 2022 breakdown by gender and offence group.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Age Group and Offence Group (2020 onwards)
datasetMetadata.description: Population of convicted penal inmates as at 31 December 2022 breakdown by age group and offence group. Age group are revised in 2020 in accordance to the national statistical standards.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Age Group and Offence Group (2006-2020)
datasetMetadata.description: Population of convicted penal inmates as at 31 December 2020 breakdown by age group and offence group.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Offence Group
datasetMetadata.description: Convicted Penal Population as at 31 December 2022 of each year breakdown by offence group.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Gender
datasetMetadata.description: Convicted Penal Population as at 31 December 2022 of each year breakdown by gender.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Education Level
datasetMetadata.description: Convicted Penal Population as at 31 December 2022 of each year breakdown by education level.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Age Group (2020 onwards)
datasetMetadata.description:
Convicted Penal Population as at 31 December of each year breakdown by Age Group. 
Age group are revised in 2020 in accordance to the national statistical standards.

datasetMetadata.name: Convicted Penal Population by Age Group (2006-2020)
datasetMetadata.description: Convicted Penal Population as at 31 December of each year breakdown by Age Group.
